content.rendered:
March 2 – An Israeli was moderately injured in a stabbing attack at a dental clinic in a village in southern Hebron.

March 5 – An IDF soldier was critically injured in a stabbing attack at the Yitzhar Junction in Samaria. The Palestinian terrorist was killed.

March 6 – An Israeli was lightly to moderately injured in a stabbing attack at a bus stop in the Neve Yaakov neighborhood of Jerusalem. The 14-year-old Palestinian terrorist, a resident of East Jerusalem, was arrested.

March 8 – Seven soldiers were injured in a combined bombing and shooting attack near Homesh in Samaria — three were moderately injured and four lightly injured.

March 13 – A security guard and a female soldier were lightly and moderately injured in a stabbing attack at the Tunnel checkpoint in Jerusalem. The Palestinian terrorist was killed.

March 14 – The stabbing attack at the Beit Kama Junction: A Palestinian terrorist, a resident of Rahat, arrived at the shopping area at the Beit Kama Junction and stabbed four people. One was killed and three others were lightly injured. The Palestinian terrorist was neutralized.

March 16 – Two Palestinian terrorists from Hebron infiltrated the Jewish settlement in Hebron and fired at children and homes. No injuries were reported. One of the Palestinian terrorists, who served as an imam in a mosque in Hebron, opened fire on children and was killed by IDF forces.

March 19 – Two Israelis were injured, one seriously, in a shooting attack near Oz VeGaon in Gush Etzion. The Palestinian terrorist was killed.

March 22 – The shooting attack at the Pras Junction: A soldier was killed and six Israelis were injured in a sniper shooting attack on a minibus at the Pras Junction in Binyamin — two were critically injured, one was moderately injured, and the others were lightly injured. The Palestinian terrorist was killed by a combat helicopter after a nearly five-hour manhunt. A 7.62 mm sniper rifle was found on his body.

March 28 – Three Israelis were injured, one moderately and two lightly, in a shooting attack on Highway 90 near the Palestinian village of Auja al-Tahta. The Palestinian terrorist, an officer in the Palestinian Authority and a resident of the village, surrendered to the IDF the following day.

March 31 – A 20-year-old civilian and a soldier were lightly injured in a stabbing attack at the central bus station in Beersheba. The Palestinian terrorist, a resident of Rahat, was killed.

March 31 – The stabbing attack in Gan Yavne: A Palestinian terrorist from Dura in the Hebron district stabbed three Israelis at the “Friendly” mall in Gan Yavne. One was critically injured and died a week later. Two were seriously injured. The Palestinian terrorist was killed.

excerpt.rendered: In March, Palestinians carried out 493 terrorist attacks, including stone-throwing incidents, resulting in 3 deaths and 29 injuries.
